Articles.Content: So I'm new and thought I would say hello! I've had KSP for a while but never really got into it just because I didn't understand it fully, I still don't now, but I am learning slowly, reading the forums and watching members YouTube videos are helping mind you!

Welcome to the forums!

Another resource that might help you out is the Drawing Board, a list of tutorials that I maintain in the thread linked in my signature. Many of those are targeted specifically at players who are just starting out with the game.

Hope this helps!
